briefTitle: Efficacy Study of Sublingual Immunotherapy to Treat Ragweed Allergies
officialTitle: Parallel, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Trial in Adults for the Sublingual-Oral Immunotherapy (SLIT) of Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis With or Without Asthma Caused By Ragweed Pollen
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine an effective dose range for the administration of ragweed allergenic extract via the sublingual route of administration

primaryOutcome.measure: Scores on a Scale (Average of Daily Rhinoconjunctivitis Symptom Score (RSS) Recorded During the Ragweed Season
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Ragweed pollen season, 08/01/08 to 10/30/08, approximately 3 months
